tiles.trigger: message:Hey there. This is Niels trying to escape the room. To continue move right...

message:Did you see this? The stone cracked behind you. You can walk two times over stones and one time over ice.
You can go left and right again without dropping.
message:Now you can't go back. Just continue to the right.
message:Some rooms have locked blocks. You need a key to open them.
message:If you picked up a key it will appear in the inventory.
message:Some tiles can only be entered for certain directions, otherwise you will fall!
message:If you have all the required keys you can escape the room through the ladder. Go ahead.
